name: Orange, Onion and Rosemary Salad
keywords: onion, orange, rosemary, raw, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon minced fresh rosemary or 1/2 teaspoon dried
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the oranges, and section them as you would a grapefruit, or slice them thinly. Peel the onion, and slice thinly. Toss both with the rosemary, a small amount of salt and pepper, and the olive oil.
Serve immediately, garnished with rosemary sprigs if you have them, or refrigerate for up to 2 hours. Bring to room temperature before serving.
